confirm.title: Konnected device ready

import_confirm.description: A Konnected alarm panel with ID {id} has been discovered in configuration.yaml. This flow will allow you to import it into a config entry.
import_confirm.title: Import Konnected device

user.description: Please enter the host information for your Konnected panel.

deprecated_firmware.description: Konnected's integration is deprecated and Konnected strongly recommends migrating to their ESPHome based firmware and integration by following the guide at {kb_page_url}. After this migration, make sure you don't have any Konnected YAML configuration left in your configuration.yaml file and remove this integration from Home Assistant.
deprecated_firmware.title: Konnected firmware is deprecated

options_io.description: Discovered a {model} at {host}. Select the base configuration of each I/O below - depending on the I/O it may allow for binary sensors (open/close contacts), digital sensors (dht and ds18b20), or switchable outputs. You'll be able to configure detailed options in the next steps.
options_io.title: Configure I/O

options_io_ext.description: Select the configuration of the remaining I/O below. You'll be able to configure detailed options in the next steps.
options_io_ext.title: Configure extended I/O

data.blink: Blink panel LED on when sending state change
data.discovery: Respond to discovery requests on your network
data.override_api_host: Override default Home Assistant API host URL

options_misc.description: Please select the desired behavior for your panel
options_misc.title: Configure misc

data.more_states: Configure additional states for this zone
data.name: [%key:common::config_flow::data::name%]
